core.utils

core.utils#

Utility module.

MPI network parameter updates are based on OpenAI’s baselines. See https://github.com/openai/baselines.

mp_rl.core.utils.soft_update(network: torch.nn.modules.module.Module, target: torch.nn.modules.module.Module, tau: float) → torch.nn.modules.module.Module#

Perform a soft update of the target network’s weights.

Shifts the weights of the target by a factor of tau into the direction of the network.

Parameters

  • network – Network from which to copy the weights.

  • target – Network that gets updated.

  • tau – Controls how much the weights are shifted. Valid in [0, 1].

Returns

The updated target network.

mp_rl.core.utils.running_average(values: list, window: int = 50, mode: str = 'valid') → float#

Compute a running average over a list of values.

Parameters

  • values – List of values that get smoothed.

  • window – Averaging window size.

  • mode – Modes for the convolution operation.

mp_rl.core.utils.unwrap_obs(obs: dict) → Tuple[numpy.ndarray]#

Unwrap an observation from a dictionary style OpenAI gym.

Parameters

obs – Gym observation.

Returns

A tuple of separated observation, desired goal and achieved goal arrays.

mp_rl.core.utils.sync_networks(network: torch.nn.modules.module.Module)#

Synchronize networks across MPI workers by broadcasting the weights of process 0.

Note

In-place function.

Parameters

network – PyTorch module that is synchronized across all workers.

mp_rl.core.utils.sync_grads(network: torch.nn.modules.module.Module)#

Synchronize gradiends across MPI workers by allreduce.

Note

In-place function.

Parameters

network – PyTorch module that synchronizes the parameter gradients.
